page.title: 01Aboyne Academy
page.content: Aboyne Academy has 633 pupils with 52 teachers. It is a village school attracting pupils from a wide area - from Braemar to Torphins, O'Neil Corse to Glen Tanar. Some children travel by bus, some leaving home at 07.30 and returning at 17.00. Pupils may attempt 'O' Grade Examinations in Year Four, 'Higher' in Five and Six and 'SYS' in Six. 'CSE' is also available. Departments are Geography, History, Modern Studies, Art, P.E., Home Economics, Maths, English, Music, Biology, Chemistry, Physics, French, German,Drama. Facilities include Swimming pool, Games Hall, Theatre, Dining Area and Squash Courts.
